metadata.synopsis: Party finds Mizora in her pod in Moonrise Towers and chooses whether to release her or flush her down the tube. If alive, she flies off to wait for Wyll. Version for if Wyll is not in Party.
metadata.how_to_trigger: With Wyll recruited but no in party, trigger Mizora's capture in Camp or at TWN  and then approach Mizora's pod in Moonrise Towers.

57.speaker: Narrator
57.text: By Graz'zt's cock, it's about time you came.
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party approaches a mind flayer pod. Inside is the half-devil Mizora, Wyll's patron. She pushes her hands against the transparent cover and smiles. Next to the pod is a console with two buttons on it, the 'unleash' and 'annihilate' buttons on the console in the tutorial.

10.text: By Graz'zt's cock, it's about time you came.
10.context: NodeContext: Graz-its cock (quite a swear indeed). Said with only the slightest urgency. Mizora should still sound her confident self, even with her trapped inside the pod

27.speaker: Mizora
27.text: By Graz'zt's cock, it's about time you came.
27.context: NodeContext: Graz-its cock (quite a swear indeed). Said with only the slightest urgency. Mizora should still sound her confident self, even with her trapped inside the pod

54.speaker: Player
54.text: Mizora? You are the devil you sent Wyll to rescue?
54.context: NodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.

19.speaker: Mizora
19.text: Thought you'd have figured it out before now.
19.context: NodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.

22.speaker: Mizora
22.text: Now enough sniffing around and get me out of this thing.
22.context: NodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.

60.speaker: Mizora
60.text: Do it, and I'll let Wyll off his leash. A devil always keeps her promises.
60.context: NodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.

43.speaker: Narrator
43.text: *Mizora's life rests in your hands. Perhaps you could end Wyll's pact, here and now.*
43.context: NodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.

77.speaker: Player
77.context: NodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.

127.speaker: Mizora
127.context: NodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: Free Wyll, or I let the cult infect you. I bet you'd make a loyal thrall.
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns their attention to the console that controls the pod.

49.speaker: Mizora
49.text: Think again. Clause Z, Section Thirteen - the 'Lemure' clause. Could've sworn we covered this.

71.speaker: Mizora
71.text: Think again. Clause Z, Section Thirteen - the 'Lemure' clause. Could've sworn we covered this.

83.speaker: Mizora
83.text: You wouldn't want Wyll to get sucked into the Hells, would you?

97.text: Incredible - you actually think you hold the winning hand.

70.speaker: Mizora
70.text: Incredible - you actually think you hold the winning hand.

88.speaker: Player
88.text: Remember all you can about devils and their contracts.
88.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns their attention to the console that controls the pod.

124.speaker: Narrator
124.text: *You recall an old incantation from a children's story, said to void a devil's contract: 'Abi, diabole, et nunquam redi.'*

25.speaker: Narrator
25.text: *You recall an old incantation from a children's story, said to void a devil's contract: 'Abi, diabole, et nunquam redi.'*

101.text: *You can think of no way to void a devil's pact.*

26.speaker: Narrator
26.text: *You can think of no way to void a devil's pact.*

116.speaker: Player
116.text: Say you know a pact-breaking charm and chant a series of pseudo-Infernal phrases.
116.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns their attention to the console that controls the pod.

36.speaker: Mizora
36.text: I'll be damned. You want to free the pup from his pact.
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns their attention to the console that controls the pod.

131.speaker: Mizora
131.text: I'll be damned. You want to free the pup from his pact.
131.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns their attention to the console that controls the pod.

17.speaker: Mizora
17.text: And you thought that idiotic display would do it? Bravo!
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns their attention to the console that controls the pod.

29.speaker: Mizora
29.text: Fine, I'll play your game. But I amend the pact once I'm freed - not before.
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns their attention to the console that controls the pod.

119.speaker: Mizora
119.text: Clause F, Section Nine: 'Soul-binder shall bestow reward or favour only upon soul-bearer's fulfilment of related obligation.'
119.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns their attention to the console that controls the pod.

34.speaker: Narrator
34.text: *You've heard of this provision - better known as the 'You First' clause.*
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns their attention to the console that controls the pod.

13.speaker: Mizora
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns their attention to the console that controls the pod.

7.speaker: Narrator
7.text: *Your eyes turn to the control panel next to the pod. It has two devices marked with illithid symbols.*
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns their attention to the console that controls the pod.

67.speaker: Narrator
67.text: *The controls are open to your tadpole's command - to your authority.*
67.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [reuse]  The player's fist slams against the pod and it cracks open.

Mizora steps out of the pod.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: Gather your strength and smash your foot through the pod.
4.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [reuse]  The player's fist slams against the pod and it cracks open.

Mizora steps out of the pod.

107.speaker: Narrator
107.text: Good work. I'd give you a gold star, but I'm fresh out.
107.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [reuse]  The player's fist slams against the pod and it cracks open.

Mizora steps out of the pod.

48.speaker: Narrator
48.text: Good work. I'd give you a gold star, but I'm fresh out.
48.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [reuse]  The player's fist slams against the pod and it cracks open.

Mizora steps out of the pod.

61.text: Good work. I'd give you a gold star, but I'm fresh out.
61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora steps out of the pod and leaps down

11.speaker: Mizora
11.text: Good work. I'd give you a gold star, but I'm fresh out.
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora steps out of the pod and leaps down

40.speaker: Mizora
40.text: As for the pact: hrm. Mm-mm-mgh-AHEM.
40.context: NodeContext: She gears up to read the contract, lots of self-please hemming and hawing leading up to it.

8.speaker: Mizora
8.text: Clause Z, Section Thirteen: 'If the soul-binder consents to separation, she will release the soul-bearer from all obligation within six months.'
8.context: NodeContext: Sound effect on voice. Something heightened, like Galadriel in lord of the rings when she goes nuts.

86.speaker: Narrator
86.text: Six months? Are nine Hells so few that you would make our lives a tenth?
86.context: CinematicNodeContext: Talking to player, then to Wyll.

9.speaker: Lae'zel
9.text: Six months? Are nine Hells so few that you would make our lives a tenth?
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Talking to player, then to Wyll.

104.speaker: Narrator
104.text: Ignorant thing. It's always the terms and conditions that get you.
104.context: CinematicNodeContext: Talking to player, then to Wyll.

68.speaker: Mizora
68.text: Ignorant thing. It's always the terms and conditions that get you.
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Talking to player, then to Wyll.

129.speaker: Player
129.text: To the Hells with your conditions. Sever Wyll's pact now, or I'll sever your head.
129.context: CinematicNodeContext: Talking to player, then to Wyll.

58.speaker: Mizora
58.text: Not going to happen, but I do like your spunk.
58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Talking to player, then to Wyll.

102.speaker: Player
102.text: A full half of a year? You've got to be kidding.
102.context: CinematicNodeContext: Talking to player, then to Wyll.

24.speaker: Mizora
24.text: Dead serious. Don't let the smile fool you.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: Shrug. Six months isn't that long of a wait.
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: Talking to player, then to Wyll.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: That warlock of yours is turning out to be more trouble than he's worth.
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Talking to player, then to Wyll.

1.speaker: Mizora
1.text: Aw, don't be so hard on him. With his daddy issues and all, he's had a rough go.
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Talking to player, then to Wyll.

110.speaker: Mizora
110.text: Right, I'm out of here - I need a long bath. I'll leave you to your very serious business.
110.context: CinematicNodeContext: An infernal rune appears on the ground beneath Mizora exits in.

5.speaker: Mizora
5.text: But don't you fret. If you survive this place, I'll find you. The pup will be needing me. Count on it.
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: An infernal rune appears on the ground beneath Mizora exits in.

133.speaker: Mizora
133.text: Oh, and ask Wyll how we met - I've loosened his tongue. It's a real cracker of a tale. Ta-ta!
133.context: CinematicNodeContext: An infernal rune appears on the ground beneath Mizora exits in.

2.speaker: Narrator
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: An infernal rune appears on the ground beneath Mizora exits in.

91.speaker: Shadowheart
91.text: Six months? We could be long dead before that long's elapsed.

59.speaker: Astarion
59.text: Six months until he's free? You little rat.

80.speaker: Gale
80.text: Six months is a trifle - you'd barely read through a single bookcase in Candlekeep in such a time.

79.speaker: Karlach
79.text: You're a disgusting little shit, you know that, Mizora?

122.speaker: Halsin
122.text: Six months? It can be done. A long life well lived will soon render it but a fleeting memory.

28.speaker: Jaheira
28.text: The limpet clings on. Young Wyll had parasite problems well before the tadpole, it seems.
28.context: NodeContext: Utter amused scorn for Mizora and all her kind - cambions are just parasites, clinging onto living souls

123.speaker: Player
123.text: I've got half a mind to kill you where you stand.

106.speaker: Mizora
106.text: Me? I'm out of here. You? I don't play tarot.

16.speaker: Mizora
16.text: My sparkling disposition will more than suffice.

98.context: CinematicNodeContext: [reuse] The player's fist slams against the pod but it remains intact.

21.speaker: Narrator
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: [reuse] The player's fist slams against the pod but it remains intact.

37.speaker: Player
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: A psionic blast is released and Mizora is killed.

93.speaker: Player
93.text: Examine the device on the left.
93.context: CinematicNodeContext: A psionic blast is released and Mizora is killed.

64.speaker: Narrator
64.text: *You know this symbol from the mind flayer ship. It means 'annihilate'.*

32.text: *You can make no sense of the symbol.*

132.speaker: Narrator
132.text: *You can make no sense of the symbol.*

81.speaker: Player
81.text: Examine the device on the right.
81.context: CinematicNodeContext: A psionic blast is released and Mizora is killed.

20.speaker: Narrator
20.text: *You recognise the marking from the nautiloid: an illithid symbol meaning 'unleash'.*

74.speaker: Mizora
74.text: *You decipher the symbol: it's an illithid sigil meaning 'unleash'.*

31.speaker: Player
31.text: *You decipher the symbol: it's an illithid sigil meaning 'unleash'.*

100.speaker: Narrator
100.text: *You decipher the symbol: it's an illithid sigil meaning 'unleash'.*

128.speaker: Narrator
128.text: *You decipher the symbol: it's an illithid sigil meaning 'unleash'.*

69.text: *The button's symbol means nothing to you.*

125.speaker: Narrator
125.text: *The button's symbol means nothing to you.*

84.speaker: Player
84.text: Connect your mind to the device on the left and activate it.
84.context: CinematicNodeContext: A psionic blast is released and Mizora is killed.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Connect your mind to the 'annihilate' device and activate it.
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: A psionic blast is released and Mizora is killed.

114.speaker: Mizora
114.text: Hells. What's happening? What have you -
114.context: CinematicNodeContext: A psionic blast is released and Mizora is killed.

109.speaker: Narrator
109.text: *Your heart burns red-hot, then goes hollow. A presence disappears from your mind.*
109.context: CinematicNodeContext: A psionic blast is released and Mizora is killed.

96.speaker: Narrator
96.text: *Your heart burns red-hot, then goes hollow. A presence disappears from your mind.*
96.context: NodeContext: Regretful. A party member's been sent to hell, permanently.

46.speaker: Narrator
46.text: *The Hells have taken Wyll as their own. He is lost to the fires of Avernus.*
46.context: NodeContext: Regretful. A party member's been sent to hell, permanently.

14.speaker: Narrator
14.text: Gone. The Hells have claimed their prize.
14.context: NodeContext: Regretful. A party member's been sent to hell, permanently.

56.speaker: Lae'zel
56.text: Gone. The Hells have claimed their prize.
56.context: NodeContext: Regretful. A party member's been sent to hell, permanently.

85.speaker: Shadowheart
85.text: It wasn't just her fate we decided... Wyll - he belongs to the Hells now.
85.context: NodeContext: Regretful. A party member's been sent to hell, permanently.

115.speaker: Astarion
115.text: Hells. They've taken the Blade to his final frontier.

113.speaker: Gale
113.text: She's gone... and Wyll's been consigned to the Hells along with her. Farewell, Blade.

42.speaker: Karlach
42.text: Wait... what? No. This can't be. Bring him back. Bring him back NOW!

121.speaker: Halsin
121.text: She's gone... and Wyll's been dragged to the Hells in her wake. Silvanus, keep his memory.

12.speaker: Jaheira
12.text: Damnation at the flick of a switch. You cast your allies aside easily.
12.context: NodeContext: Disdain, but no blame. We've just damned a companion to the hells, and it reminds her of how easily she cast her own friend aside. She dislikes us as much as she dislikes herself.

99.speaker: Player
99.text: Connect your mind to the device on the right and activate it.
99.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player presses the right-side button on the console. Mizora falls out, then gets to her feet.

72.speaker: Player
72.text: Connect your mind to the 'unleash' device and activate it.
72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player presses the right-side button on the console. Mizora falls out, then gets to her feet.

73.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player presses the right-side button on the console. Mizora falls out, then gets to her feet.

50.speaker: Mizora
50.text: Don't take long. They pop a tadpole in me, and the Hells'll take Wyll for good.

82.text: And you figured I'd be impressed by that little display? Heartbreaking.

112.speaker: Mizora
112.text: And you figured I'd be impressed by that little display? Heartbreaking.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: Poor thing. I'll let you out of there.

95.speaker: Player
95.text: Fine, let's get on with it.

120.speaker: Player
120.text: Figures. All that talk about 'Zariel's asset', I should've known you were lying.

130.speaker: Mizora
130.text: Why, perish the thought. Every word was nothing less than true.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: What have we here? Hold on - I need to relish the moment.

103.speaker: Mizora
103.text: Go on and gloat, bow to your pretend crowd.

33.speaker: Mizora
33.text: All done? Good. Now enough sniffing around and get me out of this thing.

118.speaker: Mizora
118.context: NodeContext: Calmly but with en edge.
